mushroom_species.name: Fly Agaric
mushroom_species.description: The Fly Agaric is a well-known mushroom with a bright red cap and white spots. It is mildly toxic and can cause hallucinations if consumed.

mushroom_species.name: Death Cap
mushroom_species.description: The Death Cap is one of the deadliest mushrooms. It has a greenish-yellow cap and can be fatal if ingested.

mushroom_species.name: Chanterelle
mushroom_species.description: The Chanterelle is a delicious edible mushroom with a golden-yellow cap and a mild, fruity aroma. It is not toxic.

mushroom_species.name: Lion's Mane
mushroom_species.description: The Lion's Mane mushroom has long, white, shaggy spines and is prized for its culinary and potential medicinal benefits. It is not toxic.
